title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: You will agree with me that in our present country, It is not the most hard working that is the richest but the most smart working. The hardest labor and jobs are no longer the highest paying jobs, people sit at home and make the total money for a year that just a hard worker and not a smart worker can make. Life expectancy for Nigerians dey short because of bad health care and poor environment, we nor need to add stress to am, make we for nor go die quick. While we dey try to make money, we gats focus majorly on finding smartways to make money, not just depending on harwork, Hardwork alone no longer incurs success. Some examples of smart ways to make money are;be social and make good friends who you can grow with. The information you have can determine if you will have money or not, try get friends wey una dey talk better things like how to make more money.Do your research then invest in where others dey invest. People dey invest in bitcoins, invest in bitcoins. Share some other smart ways to make money.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: In common sense, I think hard work is more like working in an office that requires the employees to go to work at 7:30 a.m. (or 8am) and return home by 5 or 6 p.m., depending on where they are working, but smart work is more like those that work at home right on their phones or computers, and yet on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis, they always have money that flows into their accounts, and most of the smart workers don't need less time, less energy, or less stress to perform their online jobs in order to get paid. I know of a freelancer and an affiliate marketer who make about $1k to $2k every month and some months more. The fact is that some people who are going from their homes to work every day and closing late are not earning even up to what some of these affiliate marketers are earning. Another example are most of these social media celebrities who make some funny and educational skits and get paid daily.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on November 07, 2023, 10:28:18 PMYou will agree with me that in our present country, It is not the most hard working that is the richest but the most smart working. The hardest labor and jobs are no longer the highest paying jobs, people sit at home and make the total money for a year that just a hard worker and not a smart worker can make. For sure, I agree with you that smart workers make more money than hard workers. When you discover this, the first thing you have to look out for is, “Why is this thing happening?” The main reason why this is happening is because of the high number of people who engage in the work. For instance, let us take tailoring as a case study. The number of tailors in Nigeria now is so large that almost everyone knows not less than five different tailors around their location. You know, all of them can sew clothes, which means they are hardworking, but inside them there will be someone who will create a good fashion design that no one else inside the tailors can do unless they are taught, so from there that single tailor has made a smart move that he will get more money than others. The solution here is that whatever work you are doing, you should make sure you are creative so that you can be smarter than others doing the same work with you.QuoteLife expectancy for Nigerians dey short because of bad health care and poor environment, we nor need to add stress to am, make we for nor go die quick. While we dey try to make money, we gats focus majorly on finding smartways to make money, not just depending on harwork, Hardwork alone no longer incurs success. To me, life expectancy depends on your location of settlement, and I don’t think it contributes to your topic. Life expectancy means, in short, your access to those things that will make your life more safe and healthy, like an adequate water supply, a good road, adequate health care providers, the availability of light, and many others that can ensure adequate safety and standard in your life. So with this small definition, I can say that if you work smart, you can have money in rapid flow and have access to all these things.QuoteSome examples of smart ways to make money are;be social and make good friends who you can grow with. The information you have can determine if you will have money or not, try get friends wey una dey talk better things like how to make more money.Do your research then invest in where others dey invest. People dey invest in bitcoins, invest in bitcoins. Share some other smart ways to make money.Yes, keeping friends that are ready to look for more is a good option because any time you hang around, they will just be discussing where to invest so that their money can be multiplied, so if you stay around with them, you will have more experience and knowledge about making money. Also, I will suggest involving yourself in many online activities, like creating content and advertising content on various social media. All you need is to be creative, and you will get paid, so I will say creativity works with smartness, and that is what we need to succeed in Nigeria.

comments.body: Op, I disagree with for this thing way you talk like this, because for the smart work, you need dey very hard working before you go fit dey comot money online dey put for your bank account, to make $1 online no easy. No be everybody wey dey do the smart work dey see the money too and get some hand work wey go give mad money, you self no fit believe say na your hard work dey pull out this kind money such like Argon welding. Op, no go tell people to invest in Bitcoin because if they use their money come invest in Bitcoin and the price of Bitcoin come reduced, they go blame you. You fit help them buy Bitcoin when they use their leg come meet you to help them buy Bitcoin, at this point anything way happen to their Bitcoin investment no concern you again because no be you tell them to invest in Bitcoin.

comments.body: Hardwork pays o because even the smart ones are hardworking if not them no go see money pull online o it takes a lot of dedication and determination to by pass procrastination which na one major ogbonge problem way dey worry we youth for this obodo naija, talking about hard jobs not paying that much or incur success I will agree with you take for instance artisans are been paid peanuts while material price increase everyday but artisans pay will never add, imaging someone like this who is a hardworker been paid peanuts and he or she has about 4 to 5 kids, baba na wen the person go come they successful na do u really get point for here, and again true true wen u socialize with people your mindset go really change so man gats make use of him brain wen socializing  the best place to get and make friends na higher institutions

I think we have had a discussion similar to this although they aren't entirely the same because this is heading towards another direction but both threads are in relation to hardwork and smart work. The main thing wey make hardwork dun dey outdated na say e dey limit your earnings, hardwork wey be physical work go make am you no go fit dey make money from multiple sources and to survive for Nigeria you need multiple sources of income. Hardwork if you ask me na all dis 9-5 works wey be say e dey start by 9 and go end by 5 everyday without giving you the opportunity to do other things. E no matter whether you dey work for person or you dey do your own work, provided say na only hardwork wey you dey dey e go weigh you. Hardwork also include this labourer jobs dem. Even dem dangote get other soft hustle (smart work) wey dem dey do like investing in shares.QuoteSome examples of smart ways to make money are;Share some other smart ways to make money. Investing in Bitcoin (this one na the koko because na the surest wey now to dey do smart work (me I dey like call am soft work) Trading cryptocurency (this one no be only Bitcoin but all cryptocurency, if you learn am well you fit dey make better money but make sure you learn am well before doing) Investing in foreign currency (e.g buying and holding dollars for it to increase and you take profits). comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Make I assume say when you de refer to working smart, you de refer to doing online jobs or self employed job while working hard in this your context de refer to those when de do physical jobs like the normal salary earners or those people when he exert serious energy for the works them de do.The reality be say the world don evolve and the way we take de do things don also change and like some people put am here, no be who work pass de earn pass. This de remind me of when we been de school and that time we been start new, we go de enter night class almost every night de stay awake till morning before going back to the house and by 8 in the morning we go enter morning class back. For our mind we de work very hard and we go de see people when no de come night class as lazy ones while in the real sense, those people don understand the school system and de fit go read from 5pm and before 9, them don go back there hostel go sleep comfortably and de fresh to prepare for the next day lecture and when result de even finally come out, most of their result de make sense pass our own.For me, I feel say the concept of working smart rather than working hard is that while doing anything in general, you need to look at the best and most easy way you can do it in a modern way that will fetch you the same or even more than the cash you would have gotten by working your ass all out.

comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on November 07, 2023, 10:28:18 PMbe social and make good friends who you can grow with. The information you have can determine if you will have money or not, try get friends wey una dey talk better things like how to make more money.The power of a good network of smart working people can never be overemphasized, your network of likeminded people can bring you great opportunity as you will receive updates, connection and even work from a good network. A good referral can do a great good for you than a long time of working hard. If your network is strong, you have a better chance of succeeding in the modern world. Your mastermind group is also another gathering of great value whereby people who are mentally sound and resonate in the same frequency as yourself sit together occasionally or often and brainstorm on creative ideas that can lead to success. If you have these two sets of people mentioned here, work on maintaining good relationships with them and also do your own part. Be informed, read vastly and contribute to the wellbeing of others too and you are surely working smart.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Well, to be sincere, if you ask me, I will say that hard work stopped being major catalyst or drive to financial success a long time ago, it didn't start now, so if you are just realizing this, then you realized it late.For a very long time now, working smart, together with working hard, has been a major driver of financial success, i include working hard here because to me, smart work alone will not make a person financially successful, but working smart and being committed to it, which also equate to working hard, for hard work is not all about hard labor, one can be working smart and hard as well.When it comes to smart work, I believe this must have been mentioned alot of times, but I will also mention it again that investing, learning skills that are mostly related to working online and internationally, is one of the ways of working smart.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Na back in the days during the era of our parents and grand parents, na him people dey place regard on hardwork, and dey see am as a yardstick for success but right things don change. No be how much you dey labour or hustle upandan naso your money go long, sometimes na one connection or information wey you get go push you to affluence. Like this we don move from stone age to digital age. Computer, phone and internet connectivity dey play a key role for our smart hustling. People dey do legit smart hustling wey dey pay very well and if person no tell you, you no go know. Recently, I came across a video of one young guy wey no dey up to 24 years, him get forex academy and him dey do very well for himself. Based on the kind of flashy cars wey park everywhere for him compound I for dey reason whether him dey do something illegal.
